id, no, name, phone, sex, identify_type, id_card, password, imei, photo_Id, FZLX, JTZM, mz, edu_background, correct_office, correct_type, office_id, criminal_type, corr_type, birthday, orig_sentence, home_addr, admin_time, begin_time, end_time, remarks, creater_id, create_time, update_id, update_time, deleted, enabled_audit
mapper.select:
select
,f.name as office_name from fm_prisoner p left join sys_office f on p.office_id=f.id and f.enabled = 1 and f.deleted = 1 where p.deleted=0 and p.enabled_audit = 1
and ( name like concat('%',#{name},'%') or phone like concat('%',#{name},'%') )
and f.name like concat('%',#{officeName},'%')
and p.sex=#{sex}
and p.criminal_type like concat('%',#{criminalType},'%')
and p.orig_sentence like concat('%',#{origSentence},'%')
and p.corr_type like concat('%',#{corrType},'%')
limit #{start},#{rows}

select count(p.id) from fm_prisoner p left join sys_office f on p.office_id=f.id and f.enabled = 1 and f.deleted = 1 where p.deleted=0 and p.enabled_audit =1
and ( f.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') or p.phone like concat('%',#{name},'%') )
and p.name like concat('%',#{officeName},'%')
and p.sex=#{sex}
and p.criminal_type like concat('%',#{criminalType},'%')
and p.orig_sentence like concat('%',#{origSentence},'%')
and p.corr_type like concat('%',#{corrType},'%')

select
from fm_prisoner p where p.deleted=0 and p.id=#{id} and p.enabled_audit =1

select
from fm_prisoner p where p.deleted=0 and p.no=#{no} and p.enabled_audit =1
